feed.title: Jesse Schauer
feed.subtitle: One-man dev shop. The merc they call in to get stuff done. I build trust, not just code.

entry.title: How I Filtered 1,000+ Job Alert Emails with Python and AI

link.title: How I Filtered 1,000+ Job Alert Emails with Python and AI

entry.content: Job hunting gets noisy fast. I built a Python script using the Microsoft Graph API and some local LLM logic to classify and sort all my LinkedIn job alerts into folders — tagging them as review, ignore, or priority.
entry.summary: Job hunting gets noisy fast. I built a Python script using the Microsoft Graph API and some local LLM logic to classify and sort all my LinkedIn job alerts into folders — tagging them as review, ignore, or priority.
